name: Elemental HERO Yubel Neos
text: If this card is Summoned: Add 1 card with "HERO", "Neos", and/or "Yubel" in its name and/or text from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect) You can target one monster on the field with the lowest attack (Your choice if tied); destroy that target, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK. If this card is banished from the GY; Special Summon this card in Attack Position. You can only activate each effect of "Elemental HERO Yubel Neos" once per turn.
